page.title: 01General Outline
page.content: Sigglesthorne is a small rural village in{North Humberside}about 4 miles from Hornsea, and the North Sea, and about 12 miles from Beverley. The land around Sigglesthorne is mainly{arable farmland,}few farmers have livestock. There are about 200 people in Sigglesthorne but the population of Catwick is only about 100. In Sigglesthorne there is a small school,a church, and a village shop.In Catwick there is a church and a shop but there is not a school. Most of the people who live in Sigglesthorne and Catwick are very friendly. From Sigglesthorne there is a Bus-Service to Hull, Hornsea, and Beverley. You can catch a train from Hull.
